Docs.summary: Sets the rendering style of the control, through the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Format%2A> property. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
